@package lambda-core
@version 0.1.0.0

module Language.Core.Types
data Strategy

-- | 完全ベータ簡約
FullBetaReduction :: Strategy

-- | 正規順序戦略
NormalOrder :: Strategy

-- | 名前呼び戦略
CallByName :: Strategy

-- | 値呼び戦略
CallByValue :: Strategy
type Prelude lang = Map Text lang
instance GHC.Enum.Bounded Language.Core.Types.Strategy
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Language.Core.Types.Strategy
instance GHC.Read.Read Language.Core.Types.Strategy
instance GHC.Show.Show Language.Core.Types.Strategy

module Language.Core.Pretty
prettyText :: Pretty a => a -> Text

module Language.Core.Parser
runParserString :: Parser a -> String -> Either String a

module Language.Core
trim :: String -> String
render :: Pretty a => a -> String
renderPrelude :: Pretty a => Map Text a -> String
displayRender :: Pretty a => a -> Utf8Builder
strategies :: [Strategy]
